text.author: Pablo Ruiz Fabio, Clara Martínez Cantón, Thierry Poibeau
text.title: Distant Rhythm: Automatic Enjambment Detection on Four Centuries of Spanish Sonnets
text.summary: This paper presents a natural language processing system to identify and study enjambment in a large corpus of Spanish sonnets from the 15th to the 19th century.
